mapper.insert: SELECT SMSSERVER_OUT_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO smsserver_out(ID,RECIPIENT,TYPE,SEND_TYPE,TEXT,WAP_URL,WAP_EXPIRY_DATE,WAP_SIGNAL,CREATE_DATE,ORIGINATOR,ENCODING,STATUS_REPORT,FLASH_SMS,SRC_PORT,DST_PORT,SENT_DATE,REF_NO,PRIORITY,STATUS,ERRORS,GATEWAY_ID,REMAINING_QTY,SENDED_QTY,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE2,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5) VALUES (#{id},#{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wapUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wapExpiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{wapSignal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{encoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{statusReport,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{flashSms,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{srcPort,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dstPort,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{sentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{refNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{priority,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{errors,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{gatewayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remainingQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{sendedQty,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE smsserver_out
RECIPIENT = #{recipient},
TYPE = #{type},
and t.SEND_TYPE = #{sendType}
TEXT = #{text},
WAP_URL = #{wapUrl},
WAP_EXPIRY_DATE = #{wapExpiryDate},
WAP_SIGNAL = #{wapSignal},
ORIGINATOR = #{originator},
ENCODING = #{encoding},
STATUS_REPORT = #{statusReport},
FLASH_SMS = #{flashSms},
SRC_PORT = #{srcPort},
DST_PORT = #{dstPort},
SENT_DATE = #{sentDate},
REF_NO = #{refNo},
PRIORITY = #{priority},
STATUS = #{status},
ERRORS = #{errors},
GATEWAY_ID = #{gatewayId},
REMAINING_QTY = #{remainingQty},
SENDED_QTY = #{sendedQty},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
,MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
